LSU trouble
 After the polygon motor becomes active, BD signal (HSYNC) from the LSU is not detected at the specified times (41 +- 10 times within 20msec).

LSU connector disconnection or LSU’s inside harness disconnection or breakage Polygon motor rotation abnormality Improper positioning of the laser home position sensor in the LSU. Laser power voltage failure Laser emitting diode abnormality MCU PWB abnormality

CCD white level trouble
 CCD white reference level which is read during the copy lamp lighting is abnormal.
Flat cable installation failure to CCD unit Dirt on the mirror, lens, and reference white plate Copy lamp lighting failure CCD unit installation failure CCD unit abnormality MCU PWB abnormality

CCD black level trouble
 CCD black level which is read while the copy lamp is off is abnormal.
Flat cable installation failure CCD unit abnormality MCU PWB abnormality

Shifter motor trouble
 The home position is not detected within 1 sec after shifter motor drive.

The shifter home position sensor is defective. The shifter motor is defective. The shifter motor periphery circuit is defective. The condition of the MCU PWB JP4 is wrong. The assembly of the shifter motor unit is improper.

CRUM PWB data error MCU PWB error MCU PWB EEPROM error Disconnection between CRUM (toner cartridge) and MCU PWB

Thermistor open detection
 Fusing thermistor open
Thermistor defect MCU PWB defect Fusing section connector contact failure Power supply failure Fusing unit not installed

Heat roller abnormally high temperature
 Fusing temperature of 220 ~ 240°C.
Thermistor defect MCU PWB defect Fusing connector connection failure Power supply failure

Heat roller abnormally low temperature
 When the temperature does not reach 155°C within 55 sec after turning on the power, or when it falls under 145°C during printing, or when it falls under 100°C during pre-heating
Thermistor failure Heater lamp failure MCU PWB failure Thermostat failure Power supply failure Interlock switch failure

Mirror base feed trouble
 The mirror home position (MHPS) does not turn off though the feed operation is completed during mirror initial operation after turning on the power. The mirror home position (MHPS) does not turn off during shading operation. The mirror home position (MHPS) does not turn on when the mirror base is returned for the specified time after copy feed is started and SPF scanning position shift is performed.
Mirror unit defect Mirror home position sensor defect MCU PWB defect Scanner wire disconnection

Mirror base return trouble
 The mirror home position (MHPS) does not turn on though the mirror base returning is completed during mirror initial operation after turning on the power. The mirror home position does not turn on when the mirror is returned to the home position during shading. The mirror home position (MHPS) does not turn on when the mirror base returning is completed for the specified time (about 6 sec) after copy return start.
Mirror unit Mirror home position sensor defect MCU PWB defect Scanner wire disconnection

Main motor lock
 The main motor encoder pulse is not detected for 400msec.
Main motor defect Harness disconnection between the MCU PWB and the main motor. Control circuit failure

Job separator motor trouble
 When the home is not detected within 2.5 sec after the job separator tray starts to move upwards.
The job separator upper limit detection sensor is defective. The job separator motor is defective. The job separator motor periphery circuit is defective. The condition of the MCU PWB JP5 is wrong.

Polygon motor lock
 The lock signal (the specified rotation speed signal) is not supplied within the specified time (about 6 sec) after starting the polygon motor rotation.
LSU connector disconnection or harness disconnection in the LSU.

Zero cross pulse (FW) trouble
 Zero cross pulse width is shifted by 55Hz +-10% or more.
MCU PWB defect Power supply unit breakdown

EEPROM serial communication error
 Error in communication with EEPROM
EEPROM failure Installation of uninitialized EEPROM MCU PWB EERPOM access circuit faiure

Counter check sum error
 Counter check sum value stored in the EEPROM is abnormal.
EEPROM failure Control circuit hung up by noises MCU PWB EEPROM access circuit defect

Adjustment value check sum error (EEPROM)
 Adjustment value data area check sum error
EEPROM failure Control circuit hung up by noises MCU PWB EEPROM access circuit failure
